duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the financial and program analysis functions to drive sound analysis and smart business judgments.
Build robust relationships with internal and external partners, and navigate negotiations with government, industry, and foreign clients.
Contribute to challenging analytical studies and trend monitoring to support business decisions.
Cultivate strong business relationships and demonstrate proficiency in accounting standards and principles.
Support proposal preparations, negotiation strategies, and contract compliance.
Mentor junior colleagues and guide their growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
